content: this legal document provides an update on a divorce case between mr dt and mrs se it states that the parties have reached a mutual agreement on the division of their assets including a house and belongings as well as custody and financial support for their children they have waived their rights to spousal alimony and will resolve any disputes through mediation if necessary the document also addresses taxrelated matters and the payment of fees the parties declare their current domicile and capacity to act in the case and acknowledge the possibility of appointing another notary if there are conflicting interests they have reviewed a draft act and agree to its partial reading the notary is given necessary powers to sign additional acts and make corrections the deed will be sent to the parties by post and they are required to sign it within five working days the document is related to compliant shipping
